text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump THANK GOD

House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said Friday that Democrats plan to investigate a claim by Dr. Rick Bright, a top coronavirus vaccine researcher, that IMPOTUS/administration demoted him in retaliation for his skepticism regarding a COVID-19 treatment pushed by IMPOTUS. https://t.co/XxDhup2tyA
